definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

pinyin: bu4 ke3 che4 xiao1 xin4 yong4 zheng4

definition: instrument of credit/letter of credit/see also 信用證|信用证[xin4 yong4 zheng4]/CL:張|张[zhang1]

sentences.english: Can you please open an irrevocable documentary credit?
sentences.chinese: 能開一張不可撤消的跟單信用證嗎？

sentences.english: Most global transactions are carried out by a letter of credit (LC).
sentences.chinese: 大多數全球交易都是通過信用證白勺方式完成。

sentences.english: L/C Payment problem is becoming serious to each bank.
sentences.chinese: 信用證墊款問題是各銀行面對的日趨嚴重的一個問題。

sentences.english: In this paper, the newest developing of plastic optical fiber is reviewed for various communication.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述了各種通信用塑料光纖研究的最新進展。

sentences.english: Payment will be made by irrevocable Letter of Credit against presentation of documents to the issuing bank.
sentences.chinese: 付款方式爲憑單據以不可撤消的信用證向髮卡行議付。

sentences.english: In compliance with your request, we have instructed the bank to open the L/C in a few days.
sentences.chinese: 應你方的要求，我們已通知銀行在幾日內開立信用證。

sentences.english: Despite all this, GE failed to save its top-notch credit rating.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，GE還丟掉了長久以來了最高信用等級。

sentences.english: What is good with personal loan is that it does not require credit checks.
sentences.chinese: 小金額個人貨物款的一個好處是它不需要確認信用度。

sentences.english: I will have a gold card.
sentences.chinese: 我想辦一張貴行的牡丹信用卡。

sentences.english: We are in receipt of your L/C covering 1000 pairs of leather shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我們已收到你方關於1000雙皮鞋的信用證。

sentences.english: Please show us your card so we can identify whether it is one of them.
sentences.chinese: 請出示您的信用卡，我們來識別是否屬於白金卡系列。

sentences.english: From a different vantage, credit was an economic white knight.
sentences.chinese: 從一個不同的角度來看，信用是經濟的救命恩人。

sentences.english: Credit cards are an example of open-end credit.
sentences.chinese: 信用卡即爲開放型貸款的一種形式。

sentences.english: Apparent authority is an application of thegeneral principle of good faith in Civil Law.
sentences.chinese: 表見代理是誠實信用這一民法基本原則的適用。

sentences.english: An additional HKD100. - monthly fee will be charged if Diners Club is to be accepted.
sentences.chinese: 如選擇接受大來信用證，將額外收取月費港幣壹佰圓。

definition: to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
security (property held against a loan)/mortgaged property
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
Ant Check Later, consumer credit service offered by Ant Financial Services 螞蟻金服|蚂蚁金服[Ma3 yi3 Jin1 fu2]
